## OutputSelectorFields type

The additional fields attached to the output selector generated by `createSelector`<!-- -->.

\*\*Note\*\*: Although  and  are included in the attached fields, the fields themselves are independent of the type of  and  functions. Meaning this type is not going to generate additional fields based on what functions we use to memoize our selectors.

\_This type is not to be confused with .\_

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type OutputSelectorFields<InputSelectors extends SelectorArray = SelectorArray, Result = unknown, MemoizeFunction extends UnknownMemoizer = typeof weakMapMemoize, ArgsMemoizeFunction extends UnknownMemoizer = typeof weakMapMemoize> = {
    resultFunc: Combiner<InputSelectors, Result>;
    memoizedResultFunc: Combiner<InputSelectors, Result> & ExtractMemoizerFields<MemoizeFunction>;
    lastResult: () => Result;
    dependencies: InputSelectors;
    recomputations: () => number;
    resetRecomputations: () => void;
    dependencyRecomputations: () => number;
    resetDependencyRecomputations: () => void;
} & Simplify<Required<Pick<CreateSelectorOptions<MemoizeFunction, ArgsMemoizeFunction>, 'argsMemoize' | 'memoize'>>>;
```
**References:** [SelectorArray](./reselect.selectorarray.md)<!-- -->, [UnknownMemoizer](./reselect.unknownmemoizer.md)<!-- -->, [Combiner](./reselect.combiner.md)<!-- -->, [ExtractMemoizerFields](./reselect.extractmemoizerfields.md)<!-- -->, [CreateSelectorOptions](./reselect.createselectoroptions.md)
